price: 他们舍安拉而崇拜那些对他们既无福又无祸的东西，不信道者是极力反抗自己的主的。
arabic: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمۡ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمۡۗ وَكَانَ ٱلۡكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿuhum walā yaḍurruhum wakāna al-kāfiru ʿalā rabbihi ẓahīran
